title: Shank 2 v1.1 online
description:
Shank 2 v1.1


Features of this edition:

- Updated with the latest patch.
- The game is complete. Nothing has been deleted.
- Every character is unlocked.
- It includes the libraries the game requires.
- Multiplayer works using Steam.


F.A.Q.:

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does thanks to Voksi.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: Yes, Steam must be loaded, though the game has to be run from "Shank2.exe" (use the shortcut).

Q: Does it work under Windows 10?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
